scripts.start: if-env NODE_ENV=production && npm run start:prod || npm run start:dev
scripts.start:prod: set http_proxy=http://web-proxy.israel.hp.com:8080 https_proxy=http://web-proxy.israel.hp.com:8080 && npm install && webpack && node server.js
scripts.start:dev: set http_proxy=http://web-proxy.israel.hp.com:8080 https_proxy=http://web-proxy.israel.hp.com:8080 && npm install && webpack && node server.js
